testimonials.name: Lena Rieger
testimonials.quote: Kathrin has the incredible superpower of seamlessly blending creativity with a deep understanding of user experience and tech principles. Her keen eye for detail, collaborative nature, and ability to meet deadlines make her an invaluable asset to any team. I wholeheartedly recommend Kathrin for her exceptional design skills and dedication to creating impactful user experiences.

testimonials.name: Beth Thayne
testimonials.quote: Kathrin's strength lies in asking the right questions at the right time, bringing focus and clarity to tasks. She demonstrates creativity and out-of-the-box thinking in prototyping, and her execution is unmatched. Kathrin designs with speed and quality while effectively communicating her intentions, process, and decisions at every stage. She is not only a talented designer but also a wonderful person, empathetic towards team members and dedicated to fostering a positive and enjoyable working environment.

featuredProjects.title: ClimatePartner YOU
featuredProjects.description: Empowering individuals to calculate their carbon footprint to take climate action.
